Notes: Date of Birth - Format: DD/MM/YYYY (stored as YYYY-MM-DD in DB, convert when filling PDF)
Vehicle make (from DVLA lookup or user entry, stored in incident_reports)
Vehicle model (from DVLA lookup or user entry, stored in incident_reports)
Policy holder name (if different from user)
Pipe-delimited format: 'FirstName LastName | Phone | Email | Company'
Options: Motorway, A Road, B Road, Urban, Rural
Description of damage to your vehicle
Full narrative of what happened (large field)
Other vehicle make (from DVLA if available)
Other vehicle model (from DVLA if available)
Other vehicle color (from DVLA if available)
Options: Passed, Failed, Refused, Not tested
Witness contact info (or formatted from incident_witnesses table)
Audio/video recording URL (show as link, not embed)
AI-generated chronological factual account (2000-2500 words - LARGE field)
Static checkbox for user to sign (not stored in DB)
